message: Hello Bob, I am pleased to offer you this product which I believe would be incredibly valuable for you. Given its potential, I'm asking for $1,350,000.  What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I understand your desire to find a good deal. I'm confident this product will exceed the value you place on it.  How about we meet in the middle at $1,275,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Alice, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $1,225,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
